content: also available at annie s archive 1 1 https //www anniesarchive com/crochet/seasonal-patterns/halloween_glass_cozies/ free-crochet https //www free-crochet com/seasonal_crochet/fall_crochet_patterns/halloween_glass_cozies/ **skill level** easy **finished size** **cozy** 4 inches tall x 2 1/2 inches in diameter **materials** medium worsted weight yarn 1 1/2 oz/75 yds/43g orange 1 oz/50 yds/28g each lavender and white 5 yds each yellow black lime green and medium green size h/8/5mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle flat buttons 7/8-inch 1 black 5/8-inch 2 lime 1/2-inch 4 black stitch marker **gauge** 7 single_crochet = 2 inches 4 single_crochet row = 1 inch
